use.flag: Install the set of "right" timezones; these timezones include leap seconds when counting seconds since the epoch (while POSIX does not) as they are based on the TAI (International Atomic Time) clock

Install the leap-seconds.list file for NTP servers. Defaults tto YES. This should eliminate the need for NTP server operators to get the file from a third part site such as the USNO, the IETF, the IANA or the Paris observatory.
